remarks: A consequence of membership in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using ordered pair extractors.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-2006.)
statement:
elopabi.1 $e |- ( x = ( 1st ` A ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elopabi.2 $e |- ( y = ( 2nd ` A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
elopabi $p |- ( A e. { <. x , y >. | ph } -> ch ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ch x y $.
